title: 2016 International 7400 Flatbed Truck
item_description:
Online Bankruptcy Auction of 2016 International 7400 Flatbed Truck- No Buyer's Premium! 

Specifications

  • Year: 2016
  • Make: International
  • Model: 7400
  • VIN: 3HAWGSTT3GL225495
  • License: 77319B3
    • Registration Expiration: 8/31/2024
    • PNO-REGISTRATION DEFERRED
  • Odometer Reads: 96,938
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 60,000 Lbs
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 315/80R22.5
  • Deck Length: 240”
  • Deck Width: 96”
  • Wall Height: 62”
  • The truck is set up to attach a truck-mount / donkey forklift 

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Gray

A truck-mount forklift / donkey forklift custom-fitted for this truck is available for sale. Please inquire. 

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once the court order is received, please allow 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, applying for new license plates, and fees due to the DMV.
